heading: HR00199
0: RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE COMMITTEE ON HEALTH TO CONDUCT AN INVESTIGATION, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, INTO THE DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH'S (DOH's) FINANCIAL AND OPERATIONAL EFFICIENCY, ECONOMY AND EFFECTIVENESS WITH THE END IN VIEW OF DETERMINING ITS CAPABILITY TO FULFILL ITS MANDATED RESPONSIBILITIES UNDER THE UNIVERSAL HEALTH CARE (UHC) ACT
status: Pending with the Committee on HEALTH since 2019-11-27
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00199
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE COMMITTEE ON HEALTH TO CONDUCT AN INVESTIGATION, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, INTO THE DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH'S (DOH's) FINANCIAL AND OPERATIONAL EFFICIENCY, ECONOMY AND EFFECTIVENESS WITH THE END IN VIEW OF DETERMINING ITS CAPABILITY TO FULFILL ITS MANDATED RESPONSIBILITIES UNDER THE UNIVERSAL HEALTH CARE (UHC) ACT
